name: QLPreviewPanelDataSource
desc: A protocol that the Quick Look preview panel uses to access the contents of its data source object.

items.name: func numberOfPreviewItems(in: QLPreviewPanel!) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the number of items that the preview panel should preview.

items.name: func previewPanel(QLPreviewPanel!, previewItemAt: Int) -> QLPreviewItem!
items.desc: Returns the item that the preview panel should preview at a given index.
